hadiths.text: Narrated An-Nu'man ibn Muqarrin: I was present at fighting along with the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), and when he did not fight at the beginning of the day, he waited till the sun had passed the meridian, the winds blew, and help came down

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي أَىِّ وَقْتٍ يُسْتَحَبُّ اللِّقَاءُ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding What Time Is Recommended For The Encounter
